title: How to Forward with Template, if possible.
content:
After much research here, I see how I can "Reply with Template" with Message Filters. I would like to forward specific messages and add a reply from a template or other method.

Is there a way to "Forward with Template? The only option I see to do this is to create a filter and add two separate actions. This means that the recipient receives two message.

Is this possible?
creator: johned0420

title: Thunderbird email
content: When I updated to Thunderbird 115.2.3 (64 bit) Supernova on my windows 7 pro my email stop working and would not accept my password
creator: djones-esq

title: I need support. I have problems upgrading from 102.x.x. to 115.2.3
content:
Version 102.x.x works fine. After upgrading to 115.2.3 some maps are empty in the compacted area, like sent items. They are visible in the separate account sections. I tried several times.

See attached images.

Kind regards, Henk Breewel Amsterdam The Netherlands.
creator: henk-firefox
